articles.author: Gloria Oladipo
articles.title: US hospital flu cases highest in a decade amid winter vaccination warning - The Guardian US
articles.description: Hospitals urge Americans to be up to date with vaccinations but 5m fewer flu vaccines administered to US adults than last year
articles.content:
Hospitalizations from the flu are the highest they have been in a decade as experts warn that other Covid variants and respiratory illnesses are on the rise.
Flu-related cases, hospitalizations, and… [+2330 chars]

articles.title: American Jailed For 4 Weeks For Slapping Singapore Airlines Crew Member - NDTV
articles.description: An American whose bomb hoax on a commercial flight prompted Singapore to scramble fighter jets was sentenced to four weeks in prison today, after a court found him guilty of causing hurt by slapping a cabin crew member.
articles.content:
The plane had to be escorted to Singapore by fighter jets. (Representational)
